channel.title: Black ops Zombie Mode Clan! (PC)
channel.description:
[b]I hope i can post this here :S otherwise. Move it please[/b] This is only for people that have Call of duty black ops for pc.
Do you like the Black ops zombie mode? Then this is something for u! I setted up a clan with currently [i]4[/i] members on the first day.
~Zombie Killing Clan~ (ZK) We host Private Matches with 4 Members and we fight Vs Zombies with stratagie. All Members have the right to vote for a map they want.
If you like this and you want to join! Feel free to join ;) [url=http://zombiekillers.buyforum.net/]http://zombiekillers.buyforum.net/[/url] (Not 100% done yet! we make it to .tk later.)
Add steam Account : Snoepie1012 Group profile url is : [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/ClanZombiekillers]http://steamcommunity.com/groups/ClanZombiekillers[/url]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/295g4si.jpg[/img]
Please no bad comments such as : pc sucks for call of duty xD
